1 var CAS = require('../constants/CASConstants');
  2 
  3 module.exports = ColumnMetaData;
  4 
  5 /**
  6  * Column meta data
  7  * @constructor
  8  */
  9 function ColumnMetaData() {
 10   this.ColumnType = null;
 11   this.CollectionElementType = CAS.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_UNKNOWN;
 12   this.Scale = -1;
 13   this.Precision = -1;
 14   this.RealName = null;
 15   this.TableName = null;
 16   this.Name = null;
 17   this.IsNullabe = false;
 18 
 19   this.DefaultValue = null;
 20   this.IsAutoIncrement = false;
 21   this.IsUniqueKey = false;
 22   this.IsPrimaryKey = false;
 23   this.IsForeignKey = false;
 24   this.IsReverseIndex = false;
 25   this.IsReverseUnique = false;
 26   this.IsShared = false;
 27 }
